short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Azkar Reminder is an Islamic extension that reminds you to make Azkar & Dua at regular intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An Islamic extension that reminds you to make Azkar & Dua at regular intervals, as the prophet (ï·º) said: "Keep your tongue moist with the remembrance of Allah."

Features:
50+ Azkar and Dua from the Holy Quran and Sunnah.
Reminds you to make Azkar & Dua every 15 minutes by default and you can easily change it and set your reminder interval. 

More features are coming soon :)
